website_summaries.verdict: Mimics the fit and comfort of adult cycling gloves, but have more padding for learners.
pros: Choice of boys and girls colors
Mimics the fit and comfort of adult cycling gloves
Soft thumb material for wiping runny noses
Loops at fingers for easy removal
cons: Do not work well on monkey bars

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy. Causes injury.
customer_reviews.text: These gloves hurt my son’s hands. Photo attached. First time he wore them for 30 mins and had red marks on the same spot, I didn’t think it was a big deal. Second time he wore them for an hour and his skin peeled off from both of his hands. I found that where the stitches meet inside of the gloves stick out a lot and it must have rubbed againt his hands enough times while he’s riding so it peeled the skin off. I’m so disppointed and would like to get a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Em2016

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loved them for rock climbing.
customer_reviews.text: The gloves were for my 7 year old granddaughter who had her bday party at a authentic indoor climbing arena in Ft Lauderdale. The gloves were the youth XL and fit perfectly. I picked out the pink star gloves and really wasn't sure if she would use them. When she put them on she felt so cool wearing them and they really helped her keep her grip (even on fake rock). She definitely will be using them again.
customer_reviews.author: bchlvr

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike gloves, not for monkey bars. Size down
customer_reviews.text: Works well for its intended purpose (bike). Finger loops are great for easily removing the gloves. I bought them for my seven year old to use on monkey bars, but she said they are too slippery and removed them. I did not deduct stars for that, since they aren't advertised for that use. If in doubt on sizing, go a size smaller, especially if you like a snugger fit. My daughter's gloves fit my adult hands. They are stretchy, and fit her fine with a bit of room, even though she measures at the very top end of the size range.
customer_reviews.author: M. A.

customer_reviews.title: Great for use with manual wheelchair.
customer_reviews.text: We just bought our second pair because our son grew out of the first pair. We probably could have started with a medium and skipped the small (he is average sized 20 months). The mediums are way easier to get on him. We purchased them for use with a manual wheelchair and they are perfect. (Size Small shown in picture)
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: kid feels like a super hero, dad feels like kid is safer - a win-win!
customer_reviews.text: my kid absolutely loves these. we use them for scooting. he goes really fast, and occasionally has some spills. when his hands hit the pavement, these gloves prevent any skids, scuffs, or scrapes. plus he feels super cool wearing them. like they're his super hero gloves! so, dad's happy because the kid is safer, kid's happy because he feels cooler! a win-win! they really get the job done. the only small issue, and this is an issue with any toddler glove, is that these take a minute or two to get on. but removing them is a breeze because they come with these cool finger loops that allow you to just pull them off. sweet! highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: scarnsworth

customer_reviews.title: She sleeps in her unicorn gloves
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 4-year-old niece because she rides a bike and a scooter and I wanted something to protect her hands. (Actually, I bought other gloves for her older sister and had to get the little one something too....) They have good padding and cute unicorns. She loves them so much her mom told me she slept in them. She is 4 1/2 but big for her age and I bought the size L. They fit perfectly, just a little room to grow. Hopefully mom can get her to take them off to wash her hands for 20 seconds 800 times a day. Prompt shipping and service from seller. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Zombie298

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: They fit according to the size chart measurements. Our son is 4, and he can put them on and take them off by himself. The finger loops are great for ease of removal. He chose the dinosaur pattern, and they were just as pictured. They have enough padding to keep his hands comfortable on long rides. The couple of times he has wiped out, they kept his palms from getting scraped up, and the gloves didn’t get damaged. He also loves having bike gloves to wear like Mom and Dad, but he wanted to know why our gloves didn’t have cool dinosaurs on them.
customer_reviews.author: LizG

customer_reviews.title: Not just for sports!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my handicap daughter who is 4 years old and has a problem with biting her fingers and thumb when she gets over stimulated. I put them on her just before school in the morning and take them off just before bed. Her fingers are exposed so she doesn't struggle with playing or even eatting snacks. The padding is great for her if she falls and she has cut down on biting herself significantly due to the texture change. I am so glad that me and my husband thought to get these. They have saved her hands and I will buy more when she wares these out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for any type of protection
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these little gloves for my 2 yr old grandson who had hemophilia B......when he runs and falls, he can damage his hands and cause internal bleeding in his joints. These gloves have a nice padding across the hand, yet he can still use his hands for picking things up and holding them. I did have to remove the loops but understand why they're useful. Great product for something I'm sure they weren't designed for!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the convenient removal loops!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these gloves for my grandson's 4th birthday to wear when on his new scooter. They've saved his little hands a few times already after spills. Even though any gloves can be a challenge to put on a little one, after a few days the process became much easier. I especially like the two little loops on the palms for easy removal. Thank you!! We all love the stylish, flashy colors, too. (I just bought a second pair for my grandson who will turn 2 in Dec.but can't give any feedback yet on how they will work for that age.)
customer_reviews.author: amazonjunkie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my kid
customer_reviews.text: In the process of learning how to ride her scooter and bicycle she had a few wipe-outs. On longer rides she also complained about her hands getting sore. The extra padding and protection these gloves provide seem to have helped with both of these issues. They also seem to give her an improved grip on hot days. The loops are great and make it easy for her to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip R

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddlers- if you get the right size
customer_reviews.text: Bought both the size 1-2 years and 3-4 years since I was unsure what would fit my 2.5 year old of above average height. The 1-2 year size was way too small but the 3-4 size fit snugly. With the right fit, these are great! Protect my son’s hands as he learns to operate a balance bike.
customer_reviews.author: mixedballerina

customer_reviews.title: good for 4 year old
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old needed some hand protection for bike riding. these fit just right in 3-4 size, she is a little petite. Good for confidence. Seem to be well made, but only wore once so far so we will see. I am planning to get some for my large 2 year old as well and think 3-4 size for her, as they are only slightly large on her. Both girls like the blue star pattern and it goes with our frozen and my little pony stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Leanna

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of medium gloves for my son who just turned 4 years old and he is 3 '5" and 35 lbs. My son just barely got his training wheels off a couple of months ago so I started taking him to ride on beginner mountain biking trails. These gloves are much better quality than what you can find at Wal-Mart, and remind me of the same quality that I get from my own Fox gloves. My son has crashed multiple times and these gloves have help up great. When my son grows out of these I will by him a larger pair from the same brand and my daughter will inherit these.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan D Olsen

customer_reviews.title: well constructed and great protection
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 3 and I went with a size medium. She's tall for her age so I wasn't certain what would be right, but these are a good fit. They appear really small in the package, but I guess I didn't have an appreciation for how little a little one's hands are to begin with. She loves them and they've held up well from her scooter thrills and spills.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan D.

customer_reviews.title: These little biking gloves are beautiful, very well made
customer_reviews.text: These little biking gloves are beautiful, very well made, and the child's size large perfectly fit my 6 almost 7 year old granddaughter. And MOST importantly, she loves them!! They are so sharp looking, and I want to stress that they are very well made and sturdy. I will purchase again when she needs the next size, and the next, and the next....
customer_reviews.author: Pearl

customer_reviews.title: He just loves his ZippyRooz Toddler Bike Gloves
customer_reviews.text: These bike gloves were perfect for the grandson. He is only 20 months old, but loves, loves, loves his Stryder bike and after watching the videos of other kiddos riding he insisted on needing gloves. After all, he was riding like the guys in the videos! The quality, fit and design are excellent. We could not have asked for a better product to get this little guy off to a great riding start. We even purchased the next size, just to be careful and now we have the size to grow into. Thanks so much for offering high-quality products, that is great looking, and meets the needs and desires of a 20-month-old. He is now ready to go, go, go!
customer_reviews.author: Curious

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, so far...
customer_reviews.text: My little guy thinks they are AWESOME! He’s five and asked several times for gloves to ride his bike, scooter, skateboard, and do flips. These are eye catching and the designs were appropriate for kids. I just washed and set to air dry... let’s see how they hold up. As of now, one week in with PLENTY of stress test...we shall see how they pan out.
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: Increases confidence in little bike riders!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old took 2 big spills on her bike after wearing these gloves- no scratches on her palms (only her knees). These gloves have increased confidence in both of my children while learning to ride their bikes. My 5 year old was scared after a big spill without gloves, but now she bikes without hesitation and even tries to fall sometimes just to test them out.
customer_reviews.author: Creigle

customer_reviews.title: Good product, well designed
customer_reviews.text: I don't have this "cheap trash" feeling I'm getting lately with other purchases. So I can say we are happy with the purchase. Looks like a good protecting glove made with quality components. Sadly there was no "full fingers" model available for the design we liked.
customer_reviews.author: Abdiel Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Feels like a big kid now!
customer_reviews.text: Our son loves his dino gloves and feels like a big kid since he can ride with them. They're extremely helpful at reducing sore skin around the thumb grip area as he must grip his handles pretty tightly. They've also been great at allowing him to continue to ride with "monkey bar blister hand". Definitely measure your kids hand as per the size chart given. Our son is a young 5 and we got the XL, which fits him perfectly with a little room to grow.
customer_reviews.author: MMM

customer_reviews.title: Too big but they work.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my two year old to use with her wheelchair. I bought the correct size per age but these are WAY too big for my toddler. The open end of the fingers come all the way to the very tip of her fingers and one or two are actually longer than her fingers. The pull loops are bulky and annoying on smaller gloves.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn

customer_reviews.title: Good for bikes not monkey bars
customer_reviews.text: Good for bikes not monkey bars. Not slip resistant for monkey bars. Would be fine for biking but that’s not what we purchased it for.
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Kids Love & Fast Shipping
customer_reviews.text: My older daughter outgrew her old gloves and my younger daughter wanted gloves just like her big sis. ZippyRooz gloves had good reviews and I agree with those reviews. The gloves also arrived earlier than expected, which was a wonderful surprise for my girls. They were very excited to wear them and the designs are as cute in person as they are pictured online. I do not have an opinion on durability as the gloves arrived today and they have only been worn once so far.
customer_reviews.author: SB Mom

customer_reviews.title: So cute and so far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: First off, these are adorable! Gave them to my daughter for her second birthday along with her first balance bike. We don the helmet, pads, and gloves and then take her bike outside. She loves it and they are easier to get on than full finger gloves and very easy to remove by the attached loops. They appear to be of high quality. I will update my review if we ever have problems.
customer_reviews.author: MissEnota

customer_reviews.title: My Kid loves them
customer_reviews.text: My son just started riding a bike and we got these for when he falls. He likes wearing them and says they look cool which is all I really care about. We all know how fun getting pebbles out of your palms are and I want to keep him riding!
customer_reviews.author: Larry Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: Adorable biking gloves
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of biking gloves for my four year old grandson who is learning how to ride a pedal bike. He had one spill already and I thought this would be a layer of protection and safety for him. they are comfortable and durable, good quality and smart designs but may run a little small. I got medium but he is quite small on the growth chart. I think a normal four year old would not be able to fit in a medium and would need a large.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Use these for biking
customer_reviews.text: I like that she can easily get these on and off on her own. The fingers would turn inside out on our last pair and we don't have that problem at all with these. Took her a while to stop fiddling with the pull straps though. :) The padding on the palm makes me feel like a spill from the bike won't be nearly as bad as without but we haven't had a chance to test that yet. Look forward to many bike rides with these gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Basane

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than expected, but really good
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these for my 8 year old, and he absolutely loves them! After using a wheelchair for the past several years, he started complaining of his hands hurting and getting blisters. These have definitely helped. We ordered him a toddler/small kids size large, and they are too big. In fact, I could wear them. But, that isn't discouraging him at all! I will say that he is a small 8 year old - 48 inches and 50 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Billman

customer_reviews.title: Best kids glove I have encountered.
customer_reviews.text: I am an ultra cyclist, Race Across America qualifier. Only say this as a point of reference, having spent twenty years riding long distance. For my kids I was looking for something like what Chiba of Germany makes for adults. This glove is the closest I could find and I am very pleased. Well made, good materials, nice construction, and finger pulls, two loops which make getting the gloves off easy. Plus, my three kids love the graphics.
customer_reviews.author: David S

customer_reviews.title: Great lil gloves!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 4yr old and he loves them. He's a lil on the smaller side, so I had done a lot of research to find ones that would fit him. He has no problem getting them on and off by himself.
customer_reviews.author: Chicka chicka Boom boom

customer_reviews.title: He is wearing them for ice skating and I’m so glad I bought there
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old loves these gloves. He is wearing them for ice skating and I’m so glad I bought there. He gel pad on the palms definitely saved him from a few falls. Very comfy and he is able to get them in and off himself. The finger loops are very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Beaglemama2011

customer_reviews.title: Fun gloves, good fit
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two pair as wheelchair gloves for my son. They look really small, but they stretch. Fits his hand perfectly! He loves the designs. This helps him feel "cool" in his wheelchair, so thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Buckeye7273

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Design!
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought these for our 5yr old who started kindergarten and we wanted to keep him safe on the playground & in the class. He crawls, he has Cerebral Palsy and the padding in these are the absolute BEST for him & his needs! The bonus, I knew his 7yr old brother would want a pair too, so I picked out a cool pair for him. Now both of my kids have them, both are safe AND cool! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I used the sizing chart, and the small fit my large 2 year quite well. They are very cute and easy to get on and off. So far our only trouble is that he doesn't seem to like the feel of them his hands, and takes them off immediately. I'm hoping to try them each day, and maybe he'll get used to them. He's very picky about his hands-- doesn't like to have food on them, so this may just be him. But they are as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: swimmergrl

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My five year old "gymnast" loves these for practicing her gymnastics! She would not take them off and it made her feel like a "big girl". I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: D. Blake

customer_reviews.title: love these
customer_reviews.text: My child is very active and takes a lot of small spills on his scooter and bike, These gloves have saved him from skinning up his palms and they are super cute. he thinks they look awesome so he asks to put them on every time before we go outside. Love these little gloves!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat large/bulky for my 17 month old
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute! Bought them for my 17 month old girl, they're still a little big on her. She has some trouble gripping properly because her hands are so small, but I'm sure she'll grow into them within the next month or two. Great quality, nice cushioning on the palm side. Overall very pleased with this product, will update as she grows into them and can get more use out of them.
customer_reviews.author: CorMac

customer_reviews.title: Great for little hands
customer_reviews.text: Our granddaughter loves the monkey bars and climbing trees. She was getting callouses on her palms and these gloves are just the right thing to protect her hands. The colorful design makes it more appealing to the little ones. She is happy to wear them, thinks they are "cool" and her hands don't hurt any more.
customer_reviews.author: Donald R. Klein

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for little kids.
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent bmx gloves for little kids. The 3-4 size fit my almost 4 year old daughter well. The palms have cushioning in them and the velcro part is nice and secure. She rides a lot so and the unicorn print is super cute enough to make her happy to wear them every time.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L M

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I was looking for. I wanted a pair of gloves for my 2 year old grandson. Most kid gloves are too big and they are for riding his bike so they have to fit properly. Once I showed him he wouldn’t get any boo boos if he fell, he wanted to wear them all the time. They were not expensive so I got two different sizes to try and will keep the smaller ones for his little brother. He’s a normal size 2 year old and the medium is perfect
customer_reviews.author: lisamak

customer_reviews.title: Great kids gloves
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves them. They look great, fit great, and are practical. They have loops to pull to easily get the gloves off and they have fuzy fabric to wipe away sweat.
customer_reviews.author: J E Kurz

customer_reviews.title: Makes biking more cool!
customer_reviews.text: I sent them to my grandson in another state so don’t have first hand knowledge but he says they fit and he wore them in his bike. He is a serious 5 year old biker. Seriously cool!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect for our 3 year old grandson
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for our 3 year old grandson. He put them right on and wore them for the rest of his birthday party : ) They must have been comfortable as he was able to play, eat and build without taking them off. They exceeded our expectation.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl l balinski

customer_reviews.title: Loved them so much bought a second pair
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves... Originally bought 2 pair for my grandsons to use when they ride their bikes. Got them each a second pair for when they use the punching bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits my 2 year old
customer_reviews.text: its hard to find gear small enough for my 2 year olds hands, he is on the small end of "the charts". There fit great and I can tell they allow room to grow also!
customer_reviews.author: melissa hawn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 2yr old bike rider
customer_reviews.text: Got these for our 2 year old for his 2nd birthday along with a balance bike. Haven't had a fall yet to test how they'll hold up, but they seem to be good quality. And they fit great, so much so that he wears them around the house for all manner of activities (t-ball, golfing, reading). Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Consider how the child will be using them
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my grand daughter, who is 5 years old to wear in her gymnastic class because she was getting blisters. They fit her really well, but she finds she is not able to grip the 'monkey bars' well enough to hold on. So, I guess the padding makes them a little to thick given the length of her fingers. Perhaps, these are not the best choice for this type of use. She is having a great time wearing them for playing and riding her scooter.
customer_reviews.author: NJB

customer_reviews.title: Seven Year Old Says She Likes Them
customer_reviews.text: Our little 7 year old really likes these for riding her motor bike. I had to clean up a stitch that was sloppily sewn but all is good now. She loves the pull off loops.
customer_reviews.author: Tim D.

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves to protect your little one
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old daughter loves these gloves. She can easily put these on and take them off on her own. She has been wearing them daily for a couple months and they show no signs of wear, in spite of a couple crashes. They seem very protective so far and have certainly prevented some scrapes on her hands.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Jensen

customer_reviews.title: not good grip for monkey bars
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter because she was getting blisters from the monkey bars well this is true to size theseare not intended for monkey bars my daughter complains that she slips with these and can't play the monkey bars with these they have no grip what so ever
customer_reviews.author: DianaC

customer_reviews.title: I’m SO glad I ordered these!
customer_reviews.text: My son uses a wheelchair, and the rails get cold when it’s cold outside, or if we’re in the cooler section at the grocery store. He hated/refused to push his chair when this was the case, but I had a hard time finding gloves to fit since he has small hands (he’s almost 7, and the smallest size fits), so THANK YOU for making a small enough glove that is great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Elrod

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old daughter loves these. And they fit her perfectly. They are just snug and not to tight. I wish they came full fingered because they were bought to be used as mechanic gloves but she loves them regardless.
customer_reviews.author: J. Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Love These
customer_reviews.text: Oh how cute! Colorful. Thickness just right. Earned their keep the first time worn—our granddaughter fell on the pavement—sweet hands unharmed. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: M. Graham

customer_reviews.title: Easy on /off
customer_reviews.text: Gloves are used with scooter, they pad the hands well for gripping the handlebars. Especially like the easy on and easy off, hot little hands have a nice pull attached to slide the gloves off. Fun color, easy wash and care.
customer_reviews.author: Poppy

customer_reviews.title: The small is perfect for big babies or small toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in size small (1-2 years) for my 6 year old who is in the bottom 1% percentile. I bought this so he wouldn't bite his hands when he gets frustrated. My 4 year old (in 5% percentile) borrowed them and loves them and won't give them back. Everyone's happy with them... we just have to order another pair now!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves.
customer_reviews.text: My 6yo kid only bikes in these. Color is amazing and padding let's him ride with me for a very long time without his hands getting tired.
customer_reviews.author: Pav

customer_reviews.title: Great for wheelchair use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my 4 year old daughter to use with her wheelchair and they work great. The fit is good and so far the quality is great. They work very well to help keep her hands clean and also help her grip the wheels.
customer_reviews.author: A. M.

customer_reviews.title: Gloves are for biking, not monkey bars
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely more for biking than monkey bars, although the description says they are for both. Unfortunately, they don't grip well to the bars and my daughters hands kept slipping off. Despite that, they are cute and fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney O.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but does not have a good grip
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for my daughter because she kept hurting her hands on monkey bars. Unfortunately, they did not help her because her hands slipped too much with these gloves on and she wasn't able to use them with the monkey bars.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wiemann

customer_reviews.title: I love them for my 5 year old she has special ...
customer_reviews.text: I love them for my 5 year old she has special needs and always has her hands in her mouth. Prior to purchasing these her hands were really bad because of her constantly sucking and biting on them for comfort. She can still put them in her mouth but now they are protected better.
customer_reviews.author: key

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find toddler fit gloves - solved!!!
customer_reviews.text: Too cute! Very hard to find "any gloves" small enough for toddler. Too bulky, can't maneuver fingers. Bought for our 2 year old grandson. Normal built child, small chubby hands. Size 1-2 fit perfect, with little room to grow. He didn't want to take them off!!! Will definitely buy more as he grows. Haven't used much so not sure about durability. But he can move his finger with dexterity. Thank you...how about full fingered gloves, same material and sizes!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia C.

customer_reviews.title: Good for wheelchair user
customer_reviews.text: We get these for our three year old who is a full-time wheelchair user. He loves them and they help keep his hands clean.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Cute little bike gloves for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t find toddler biking fingerless gloves from any local stores. This is very affordable and well fitting gloves.
customer_reviews.author: jdea

customer_reviews.title: Fun patterns & Very Durable
customer_reviews.text: Just ordered a 2nd pair for my 6 year old. He wears them practically every school day and have endured his rough play! When they get a little grimy just throw in the wash and they look as good as new!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little gloves
customer_reviews.text: Got the size 5/6 for my 6yo and they fit perfectly. She wears them everywhere. Originally purchased to use with her bike and to wear playing Just Dance.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Jones

customer_reviews.title: Cute and well made biking gloves for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Both my daughters love their gloves. The fit is perfect and they are very well made. We couldn't find many gloves that appealed to kids, especially girls, but these fit the bill! They are great and have already saved some skin on their hands after a couple of wipeouts on gravel roads. We are very happy with them :)
customer_reviews.author: P Villella

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: These are our favorite gloves to get our now 5 year old. We’ve bought several pairs and they last nicely.
customer_reviews.author: k lee

customer_reviews.title: Good protection
customer_reviews.text: Easy on,easy off. My daughter loves these and the do a great job protecting her hands when she goes biking.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Got these for our son's 2nd birthday. They had a small tear in them and were very snug even though we went off the sizing. Should have sized up. But he enjoyed them so thats all that matters.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Bryant

customer_reviews.title: perfect pair
customer_reviews.text: i have not given this to the little boy yet it is for xmas but he loves dinosaurs and his dad is a fitness trainer!
customer_reviews.author: willow

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves her gloves and the little straps help ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her gloves and the little straps help her get them off much easier than her others.
customer_reviews.author: Scott S.

customer_reviews.title: My grandchildren LOVE them!  Excellent protection and comfort during outdoor activities.
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren LOVE them and wear them everyday to school. They protect their hands on playground equipment as well as during other activities.
customer_reviews.author: JD Hamel

customer_reviews.title: Best kids glove out there for not just riding
customer_reviews.text: My son turned 3 yesterday and I can't believe how perfect the M 3-4yo fit his hands and with room to grow for sure. His new bike was the big hit but these gloves stole the show. He wore them the entire party even on the monkey bars. He gets huge blisters from playing on the bars so much and these gloves will definitely solve the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Love the Design!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy on/off for 5yr old wheelchair bound child. Helps to keep little fingers safe and clean. Love the design.
customer_reviews.author: onechild

customer_reviews.title: Durable product
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this set of gloves! They are breathable and comfortable... and they fit perfectly. Totally recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn A-T

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: We are so excited to have these for our son. So neat to find gloves this small. He is average size and the 1-2 fits him with a little room (he’s just over 2). Looking forward to many years wearing zippyrooz!
customer_reviews.author: Mary U.

customer_reviews.title: and these gloves work great at protecting her hands
customer_reviews.text: My little one is temporarily in a wheelchair due to a broken leg, and these gloves work great at protecting her hands, cushioning them, and keeping them clean. She is a bit small to reach the grab-bars on the wheels, so she grabs the wheels instead, and these work great. She likes them, and she can easily take them off with the little finger loops!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca W

customer_reviews.title: Not sure yet
customer_reviews.text: My grandson hasn’t tried them on yet but the look nice and seem to be nicely padded. At this time I rate the gloves a four star only because I needed a size M and that was the only size unaviable.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Stinking cute! Perfect fit for my 2yr old. I purchased the 3-4yr gloves. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: KbNc

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and super cute!
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what we have been looking for as protectors for our daughter who is a hand chewer. Our Dr was even super pleased with them and very supportive of them. We will be order more of these! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves them
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Great value. My daughter loves them. They fit well based off the sizing chart. Very happy and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KennethF

customer_reviews.title: Comfy & cute!
customer_reviews.text: Loved it, from its bright colors to material, seems durable and she loved them, therefore will wear them, win!, win! Also Everyone at bday party said how cute they were👍
customer_reviews.author: DNet Craig

customer_reviews.title: Fits my 5 year old great!
customer_reviews.text: My five year old loves them! We got the dinosaur ones, he can train his scooter and bike without hurting himself
customer_reviews.author: Angie Padilla

customer_reviews.title: Bike Gloves that work
customer_reviews.text: It fit my son's hand well and easy to take off. I would order one size up which is what I did and it fits great.
customer_reviews.author: Pickymom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gloves for toddler
customer_reviews.text: I love the ZippyRooz! They are so cute. I'm amazed that I found gloves small enough to fit a toddler. My son is 22 months and the size small fits pretty good, still some room to grow. He can't quite use the little pull loops to get them off but I think when he wears them more and gets used to them he will be able to get them off on his own. It is not the easiest thing putting the gloves on him but that is by no means the gloves fault...think toddler. I am overall so happy with them that I plan on buying them for some friends kids.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My dinosaur loving six year old loves these and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Super cute little gloves
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are so tiny and adorable. I'm happy that they will fit my 2 yr old. They have nice padding on the front to protect against falls.
customer_reviews.author: Just wOnderful

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and the kids love them
customer_reviews.text: The kids LOVE these! Great for riding and just to wear for fun.
customer_reviews.author: mommywifelife

customer_reviews.title: Still a good glove.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the small for my son last year and the color was accurate (red, white, & light blue) so as he started to grow out of them I order the medium is the same pattern but they showed up (PINK, white, & blue). Will be returning for a different print but still good gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Great fitting kids glove.
customer_reviews.text: Finally a really nice glove that fits my sons hands. He loves them.
customer_reviews.author: michael crosby

customer_reviews.title: The description clearly says these gloves can also be used ...
customer_reviews.text: The description clearly says these gloves can also be used for other sports, such as monkey bars, etc. These do NOT grip monkey bars.
customer_reviews.author: CKJPJ

customer_reviews.title: Best little kid cycling gloves!
customer_reviews.text: Best! We have several pairs for out little guys. They fit and hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: nicole holstclaw

customer_reviews.title: Bought again for the second child
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter has already been using these gloves for more than a year. Had to buy one for my soon to be 5YO son. Got these the other day - he loves them, and they keep him safe. He's not a very big boy - so the Large fits a little loose, but they are still comfortable. Would certainly, recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. A

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Child is 8. The sizing is perfect. I was shocked at their durability, and they feel good. She didn’t want to take them off.
customer_reviews.author: Kassondra

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not a monkey bar glove - NO Grip!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed - my daughter put them on and had leas grip than hands, she was slipping all over the place and we took them off immediately. This might be a good bike glove but not for playing and climbing on monkey bars in the park.
customer_reviews.author: Don Perini

customer_reviews.title: More fashionable than helpful for grip.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his gloves. As a parent, I would like them to have a material that helped with grip. The fabric on the palm of the gloves can make for a slippery grip.
customer_reviews.author: Tim McCollum

customer_reviews.title: Okay product
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, too big for my youngest but fit my eldest. Can't get her to wear them but that's not the products fault. They are hard to get on and she gets frustrated and bails
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Silverman

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Awesome monkey bar gloves. They are so comfortable my kid doesn't want to remove them.
customer_reviews.author: Ebony

customer_reviews.title: my daughter loves these!
customer_reviews.text: my daughter loves the monkey bars and gets blisters and rips her hands open. This is the only thing that helps her!
customer_reviews.author: kevin riche

product_meta.title: ZippyRooz Toddler & Little Kids Bike Gloves for Balance and Pedal Bicycles for Ages 1-8 Years Old. 8 Designs for Boys & Girls
feature_bullets: 💥 WARNING: Wearing these gloves may give your little ones SuperHero Powers!
💥 Sized for the smallest of Sports Action Heros, from 1 years old up to Children age 8
💥 Designed to keep your kids comfortable & protected while engaging in their favorite sport.
💥 Soft thumb material for wiping runny noses. Loops at fingers for easy removal

💥 Ideal for multiple sports such as Riding Bicycles, Skateboards, Scooters, Roller Skates, Roller Blades, Balance Boards, etc. However, our gloves are soft and padded and NOT recommended for monkey bars.
